result.title: 1st project activity report
result.description: D7.31st project activity report (M12) (DNET). The 1st Annual Report provides a summary of the major results and achievements of the project during the first 12 months period and reports on the resources spent to make these achievements.

result.title: Initial Enabler for FunCodes
result.description: D2.2 Initial Enabler for FCs(M16) (UPC). This deliverable reports the initial description of the required FCs enablers and the initial solution adopted to manage FCs features, identity and encoding/encryption of information. Final semantic model addressing Enablers features will be also presented and evaluated.

result.title: Infrastructure for trials and pilots
result.description: D5.1 Infrastructure for trials and pilots(M12) (DNET). This deliverable reviews existing infrastructure available for experimentation and trials purposes, based on specified requirements and envisioned use cases that T5.2 and T5.3 will trial. Validation plan will be defined together with initial strategy for user engagement.

result.title: Developer environment for service composition
result.description: D4.4 Developer environment for service composition(M36) (DNET). The deliverable presents the final implemented version of the integrated user and developer environment and the latest version of the CaaS, with explanation of functionalities and user manual. Final environment usability aspects, taking into account feedback from ecosystem engagement, will be considered and reported alongside with other system performance metrics. This deliverable will also capture the later stage developments from T4.1 and T4.2 tasks.

result.title: FCs life-cycle management
result.description: D2.4 FunCodes life-cycle management (M30) (DNET). This deliverable describes the final implementation of the FCs information storage and sharing system by providing details about the final semantic model implementation and of techniques to protect data confidentiality and classify data quality and reputation. An evaluation of the proposed solution according to well-defined KPIs is also expected.

result.title: Integrated FC-scanner environment
result.description: D3.4 Integrated FC-scanner environment (M30) (UNIS). result.title: Final TagItSmart! Reference Architecture and API description
result.description: D1.3 Final TagItSmart! Reference Architecture and API description (M24) (DNET). This deliverable describes the final version of the architecture based on the feedback received from the implementation in the technical (WP 2-4) and the initial use case deployment (WP5) and planned Open Call initial outcome. Final version of the APIs will be presented in order to allow further extension of architecture and inclusion with existing ones.

result.title: Final Enablers for FC-scanners
result.description: D3.3 Final Enablers for FC-scanners (M24) (UPC). This deliverable will report the final implemented version of the enablers for FC-scanners and it will report initial results of their evaluation in real field trial environment.Initial enablers for context-aware and privacy-preserving FC-scanners usage will be also considered and evaluated
